contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 27, 2014 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Adam Smith Theatre, Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland, UK Band adjudicator: David Hirst Solos adjudicator: David Frame
Winning Conductor: Charlie Farren
Best Fife 'A' Band: Kingdom Brass Best Fife 'B' Band: Tullis Russell Intermediate
Best 1st Section: Bo'ness & Carriden Best 2nd Section: Tullis Russell Mills Best 3rd Section: Barrhead Burgh Best 4th Section: Whitburn Heartlands
Best Cornet: Soprano, Newmilns & Galston Best Horn/Flugel: Horn, Kingdom Brass Best Euphonium/Baritone: Euphonium, Bon Accord Best Trombone: Kingdom Brass Best Basses: Tullis Russell Best Percussion: Bo'ness & Carriden
Sept. 1, 2014, 2:29 p.m. Sept. 29, 2014, 10:39 a.m.
1 Bo'ness and Carriden Band Charlie Farren Dances and Alleluias
2 Kingdom Brass David McLeod Elgar Variations
3 Bon-Accord Silver Band Steve Malcolm Of Distant Memories
4 Newmilns and Galston Band Alan Cameron Un Vie de Matelot (A Sailor's Life)
5 Lochgelly Band Kenneth Letham Dances and Arias
6 Tullis Russell Mills Paul Drury Traversada
7 City of Discovery Eoin Tonner Mountain Views
8 Coalburn Bronze Gareth Bowman Mountain Views
9 Arbroath Instrumental Michael Robertson Celestial Prospect
10 Newtongrange Band Ross Brotherston Blazon
11 Broxburn and Livingston Brass Paul Stone Triumphant Rhapsody
12 Whitburn Heartlands Robert Fraser The Dark Side of the Moon
13 Barrhead Burgh Brian Keachie Variations on Laudate Dominum
14 Tullis Russell Intermediate Band Steven Craig Symphony for Brass
15 Irvine and Dreghorn Band John Boax The Dark Side of the Moon
16 Campbeltown Brass Gordon Evans English Folk Song Suite
17 Dumfries Town Neill McDonald Olympus
Withdrawn Bathgate Band Unknown
Withdrawn Dalkeith and Monktonhall Band Jim Chamberlain
Withdrawn Dunfermline Town Unknown
Withdrawn Shotts St Patrick's Brass Unknown
